author: namngrg
content:
Hi <@543900561460822016> is there any update regarding the agenda of https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/883 . 

We wanted to discuss miner to miner communication and wondering if it is possible to do it in this call?

author: lightclient
content: what kind of miner to miner communication you would want to integrate into the devp2p layer?

author: namngrg
content: Actually we were researching on current miner to miner communication wrt to a private blockchain solution to analyse security concerns for data transmitted. And wanted to discuss/ask some things

author: lightclient
content: i’m not sure this call is going to be right place to do that. if you have questions or proposals I would send them in this channel and if there is engagement / it’s applicable to mainnet we could open it for discussion on the call!
